name: BassX Elite
description: High-fidelity wireless over-ear headphones with 40 hours of battery life, advanced active noise cancellation, deep bass, and studio-grade sound for an immersive listening experience.

name: HyperOne Ultra
description: Premium 5G smartphone featuring a cutting-edge Dimensity 9200+ chipset, 16GB RAM, 512GB storage, and a 6.8-inch LTPO AMOLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate. Ideal for gaming, photography, and high-performance multitasking.

name: iPhone Pro Max
description: Flagship smartphone powered by the latest A17 Bionic chip || 12GB RAM || 512GB storage || 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion. Perfect for photography, gaming, and seamless multitasking. Premium design with advanced security and all-day battery life.

name: Pixel Ultra 5G
description: Powerful Android flagship with the latest Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor || 16GB RAM || 512GB storage || 6.8-inch LTPO OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate. Optimized for gaming, photography, and high-performance multitasking. Sleek design with a premium build and long-lasting battery.

name: Samsung Curved 4K TV
description: Elevate your home entertainment with the Samsung Curved 4K Smart TV. Featuring a stunning 65-inch QLED display with HDR10+ support || AI-powered upscaling || 120Hz refresh rate for smooth visuals. Perfect for immersive gaming, streaming, and cinematic movie experiences with Dolby Atmos sound.

name: NoiseMax 360
description: Experience immersive sound with the NoiseMax 360 Wireless Headphones. Equipped with advanced noise cancellation, a comfortable over-ear fit, 50 hours of playtime, and seamless Bluetooth 5.2 connectivity. Ideal for music lovers, gaming, and commuting.

name: BassFlow 500
description: Unleash rich sound with the BassFlow 500 Portable Bluetooth Speaker. Featuring 360Â° surround sound, powerful bass, and up to 15 hours of battery life. Perfect for both indoor and outdoor adventures.

name: FusionBook Pro 16
description: Experience cutting-edge performance with the FusionBook Pro 16. Equipped with the latest i7 processor, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, and a 16-inch Full HD display. Perfect for professionals, creatives, and power users. Sleek design with exceptional performance.

name: TimeX Elite
description: Powerful and portable, the NovaBook X1 blends performance with elegance. Featuring a sleek design, fast processing, and all-day battery. Perfect for work, travel, and everyday computing.

name: EdgePhone 12
description: The EdgePhone 12 features a 6.4-inch Super AMOLED display, 128GB storage, and a 48MP triple-camera system. Powered by a Snapdragon 888 processor, it offers exceptional performance, 5G connectivity, and a sleek design. Perfect for gaming, media, and everyday use.

name: AudioMax Pro 50
description: The AudioMax Pro 50 delivers premium sound with deep bass and crystal-clear highs. Featuring active noise cancellation, a 50-hour battery life, and a comfortable over-ear design. Perfect for music lovers, gaming, and professional audio work.

name: iPhone 14 Pro
description: The iPhone 14 Pro features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A16 Bionic chip, 128GB storage, and a triple-camera system with 48MP main lens. With 5G connectivity and a premium design, it delivers exceptional performance and photography capabilities.
